components.name: Ray Core
components.description: The central component that manages the execution of tasks and scheduling across distributed nodes.

components.name: Docker Container
components.description: Containerization component that encapsulates the application environment for consistent deployment across different platforms.

components.name: CI/CD Pipeline
components.description: Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment system that automates the building, testing, and deployment of applications.

components.name: Dependency Management
components.description: Component responsible for managing and resolving dependencies required by the application.

data_flows.description: The CI/CD pipeline builds the application and pushes the Docker image to the container registry.
Ray Core requests necessary dependencies from the Dependency Management component during task execution.

trust_boundaries.name: Deployment Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the development environment and the production environment.
